CST PAC Meeting 2016more_vert

2016 PAC Meeting Notes

Computer Systems Technicianclose

C.S.T PAC is a fantastic meeting where the Niagara College instructors and administration meet with industry professionals from the area. Together, they work out the best way to set students up for success in the CST program.
